clues.response: (2 of) an eye, a tooth, a hand & a foot

clues.text: The Dead Sea Scrolls contain parts of every book of the Old Testament except the one named for her

rounds.text: In Chapter 1, Verse 1, authorship of the book of Proverbs is attributed to this man
